items.name: Hot Chicken Tenders
items.description: These Spicy Chicken Tenders are ridiculously delicious! Chicken strips marinated in buttermilk and hot sauce, then deep fried for extra crispiness

items.name: Portabello Burger
items.description: Giant slab of portabello with garlic aioli on a toasted brioche bun.

items.name: Nashville Hot Cheesecake
items.description: Traditional cheesecake with a cayenne and bourbon glaze.

items.name: Sweet Potato Fries
items.description: Thick cut sweet potato wedges, lightly salted. Served with honey.

items.name: Muzic City Stix
items.description: Classic mozzarella sticks with a thick coat of parmesan breadcrumbs, lightly fried and served with tomato basil sauce.

items.name: Whole Lotta Steak'n Going On
items.description: This steak is seared to perfection while cooked over a great ball of fire. Served with garlic-rosemary smashed potatoes.
